law.catch_line: Reporting of robbery, theft, or missing shipment of controlled substances.
law.text:
A pharmacy located in Kentucky which has a robbery or theft of a controlled substance shall immediately following the robbery or discovery of the theft report the incident to a law enforcement agency serving the geographic area in which the pharmacy is located.
A pharmacy which has mailed or shipped a controlled substance to a location in Kentucky and learns that the mailing or shipment did not arrive shall within three
business days report that nonreceipt to:
The Department of Kentucky State Police; and
If applicable, the United States Postal Inspection Service.
